landing.title: Admin Backend
landing.subtitle: Select a section.
landing.noMatch: No admin section matches your search.

strategiesIndex.title: Strategies
strategiesIndex.subtitle: Manage local, AI, and composite strategies.

predictionDefaults.title: Admin · Prediction Defaults
predictionDefaults.subtitle: Global defaults for newly created prediction schedules.
predictionDefaults.signalModeHint: Applies to newly created predictions. Current: {current}

messages.defaultsLoaded: Default values loaded into form (not saved yet).

accessSection.title: Admin · Access & Limits
accessSection.subtitle: Control visible main sections and temporary create limits for normal users.
accessSection.limitsHint: Use empty for unlimited, 0 to block, and values >= 1 as hard caps.

messages.defaultsLoaded: Default values loaded into form (not saved yet).

serverInfo.title: Admin · Server IP
serverInfo.subtitle: Set the public server IP shown to users in exchange account settings.
serverInfo.hint: Users can use this IP for CEX API whitelist if required.

messages.defaultLoaded: ENV default loaded into form (not saved yet).

predictionRefresh.title: Admin · Prediction Refresh
predictionRefresh.subtitle: Tune scheduler stability and AI refresh behavior for auto predictions.
predictionRefresh.presetTip: Tip: Load a preset first, then click "Save settings".

conservative.label: Conservative
conservative.description: Fewer signal flips and fewer AI calls.

aggressive.label: Aggressive
aggressive.description: Faster reactions with higher noise risk.

triggerDebounce.label: Trigger debounce (sec)
triggerDebounce.hint: Trigger must stay stable before a refresh starts.

aiCooldown.label: AI cooldown (sec)
aiCooldown.hint: Minimum delay between OpenAI explanations per symbol/timeframe.

eventThrottle.label: Event throttle (sec)
eventThrottle.hint: Repeated identical events are suppressed within this window.

hysteresisRatio.label: Hysteresis ratio (0.2 - 0.95)
hysteresisRatio.hint: Higher values are steadier (fewer flips), lower values react faster.

unstableFlipLimit.label: Unstable flip limit
unstableFlipLimit.hint: Number of flips required before the market is marked unstable.

unstableFlipWindow.label: Unstable flip window (sec)
unstableFlipWindow.hint: Time window used to count unstable signal flips.

messages.defaultsLoaded: Default values loaded into form (not saved yet).

telegram.title: Admin · Global Telegram
telegram.subtitle: Configure global Telegram credentials and delivery checks.

smtp.title: Admin · SMTP
smtp.subtitle: Manage SMTP transport used for system and reset emails.

exchanges.title: Admin · Offered Exchanges
exchanges.subtitle: Choose which exchanges are available for user account onboarding.
exchanges.description: Enabled exchanges are offered to users in exchange account setup.

users.title: Admin · Users
users.subtitle: Manage users, credentials and account access.
users.confirmDelete: Delete user {email}? This cannot be undone.

aiPrompts.title: Admin · AI Prompts
aiPrompts.subtitle: Create, store, edit and delete named prompts. Mark prompts as public for users.
aiPrompts.licensePolicyHint: Read-only status for future AI prompt licensing. Currently informational only.
aiPrompts.slTpSourceHintLocal: Uses local deterministic SL/TP calculation only.
aiPrompts.slTpSourceHintAi: Uses AI-provided levels when available and valid for the selected signal.
aiPrompts.slTpSourceHintHybrid: Prefers AI levels when valid, otherwise falls back to local SL/TP.
aiPrompts.maxTimeframesHint: Select up to 4 timeframes. Empty means no lock.
aiPrompts.marketAnalysisUpdateEnabled: Send Telegram market analysis updates for this prompt
aiPrompts.previewHint: Builds the exact `systemMessage` and `userPayload` that would be sent to AI.

messages.confidenceRange: Confidence target must be between 0 and 100.
messages.ohlcvRange: OHLCV bars must be between 20 and 500.
messages.runTimeframeRequired: Run timeframe is required when timeframe set is configured.
messages.runTimeframeMustBeInSet: Run timeframe must be one of the selected timeframes.
messages.defaultsLoaded: Default prompt settings loaded into form (not saved yet).
messages.featureSnapshotObject: featureSnapshot must be a JSON object.

aiPromptGenerator.title: Admin · AI Prompt Generator
aiPromptGenerator.subtitle: Describe a strategy and generate a ready-to-use English AI prompt with indicator/timeframe scope.
aiPromptGenerator.setActive: Set this prompt as active after save
aiPromptGenerator.strategyPlaceholder: Explain your strategy in plain language. The generator will convert this into an English hybrid AI prompt.
aiPromptGenerator.maxTimeframesHint: Select up to 4 timeframes. Empty means payload timeframe only.
aiPromptGenerator.previewHint: Review generated prompt before saving. Mode: {mode}, model: {model}.

messages.runTimeframeRequired: Run timeframe is required when timeframe set is configured.
messages.runTimeframeMustBeInSet: Run timeframe must be one of the selected timeframes.
messages.confidenceRange: Confidence target must be between 0 and 100.
messages.ohlcvRange: OHLCV bars must be between 20 and 500.
messages.generatedSaved: Prompt generated and saved. Mode: {mode}, model: {model}.
messages.previewSaveSuccess: Prompt saved from preview. Mode: {mode}, model: {model}.
messages.previewMissing: No preview available. Generate preview first.

aiTrace.title: Admin · AI Trace Logs
aiTrace.subtitle: Track OpenAI request payloads and responses for debugging. Disable when not needed.

localStrategies.subtitle: Create and manage deterministic local strategies used by composite pipelines.

messages.saveBeforePreview: Please save the strategy first before running preview.

compositeBuilder.title: Composite Strategy Builder
compositeBuilder.subtitle: Build linear pipelines using Local + AI strategy nodes and validate by dry-run on latest predictions.
compositeBuilder.selectPipelineStep: Select a pipeline step to edit config overrides.

messages.noMatchingPrediction: No matching prediction found for selected scope.
messages.saveBeforePreview: Save composite strategy first before preview.

indicatorSettings.title: Admin · Indicator Settings
indicatorSettings.subtitle: Configure global defaults and scoped overrides for integrated indicator modules.

override.intro: Define scope first, then adjust only values that should be overridden at this layer.
override.scopePriority: Priority order: global -> account -> symbol -> symbol_tf.

fields.tillFirstBreak: Stop at first break of center line
fields.onlyWhenInPDarray: Only when E is in Premium/Discount Array
fields.liquidityPreparedHint: Liquidity sweeps are active and used in prediction features.

apiKeys.title: Admin · API Keys
apiKeys.subtitle: Manage encrypted provider keys and run availability checks.

openAi.modelOptionsHint: Model setting is global and applies immediately.
openAi.envOverrideHint: ENV `AI_API_KEY` is still set. Remove it from `.env.prod` if you want DB-only key handling.

fmp.envOverrideHint: ENV `FMP_API_KEY` is still set. Remove it from `.env.prod` if you want DB-only key handling.

messages.openAiKeyRequired: Please enter an OpenAI API key.
messages.openAiModelReset: OpenAI model reset to ENV/default fallback.
messages.confirmClearOpenAi: Remove the stored OpenAI API key?
messages.fmpKeyRequired: Please enter an FMP API key.
messages.confirmClearFmp: Remove the stored FMP API key?
